og.description: In a study published by the National Bureau of Economic Research in June, a group of Stanford academ...
og.title: Stanford researchers say Obamacare could save taxpayers billions each year

twitter.description: In a study published by the National Bureau of Economic Research in June, a group of Stanford academics discovered that transferring government workers and all retirees under 65 to Obamacare would save U.S. taxpayers $12 billion per year.
twitter.creator: @Stanford_Daily
twitter.title: Stanford researchers say Obamacare could save taxpayers billions each year
